question: Which of the following statements is correct about "Kayakalp", an initiative by the government?
option1: It aims to utilize and harness the benefits of cloud computing for public services.
option2: It aims to enhance the uptake of zinc and ORS by children for treatment of diarrhea
option3: It is an online portal to track the status of a petitionerâ€™s grievance
option4: It is an initiative to promote cleanliness, hygiene and infection control practices in public health facilities.
answer: It is an initiative to promote cleanliness, hygiene and infection control practices in public health facilities.
explanation: Kayakalp is an initiative has been launched to promote cleanliness, hygiene and infection control practices in public health facilities. Under this initiative, public healthcare facilities are established that show exemplary performance meeting standards of protocols of cleanliness, hygiene and infection control will receive awards and commendation.
